card.name: Tigra
card.property: Each minion with a copy of Hunted attached loses guard. On the Hunt — Response: After the player phase begins, draw 1 card for each minion engaged with you (to a maximum of 3).

alternate.name: Greer Nelson
alternate.property: Undercover Work — Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a copy of Hunted and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
"You don't have to be an Avenger to protect others."

card.name: Moon Knight
card.property: Forced Response: After Moon Knight enters play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and put it into play engaged with you. Stun and confuse that minion.
"Hey, Greer, look what I found!"

card.name: Precinct HQ
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Precinct HQ → remove 1 threat from a scheme. Remove 1 additional threat for each minion engaged with you.
"Save your threats, mister. My friends are a lot scarier than yours." —Greer Nelson

card.name: Cat's Head Amulet
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Cat's Head Amulet → generate a [physical] resource for each minion engaged with you (to a maximum of [physical] [physical] [physical]).
Tigra's amulet allows her to change between her feline and human forms.

card.name: Sharp Claws
card.property: Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, exhaust Sharp Claws → Tigra gets +1 ATK for this attack. Choose: • This attack gains overkill. • This attack gains piercing.

card.name: Cat-Like Reflexes
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, discard Cat-Like Reflexes → prevent 3 of that damage. You may confuse a minion engaged with you.

card.name: Hunted
card.property: [star] As an additional cost to play this upgrade, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and put it into play engaged with you. Attach Hunted to that minion and stun it. Interrupt: When attached minion is defeated, ready Tigra.

card.name: Tooth and Claw
card.property: Reduce the cost to play this event by 1 for each minion engaged with you. Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Deal 4 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Feline Senses
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, stun a minion.
"It's just instinct. This cat's got to hunt." —Tigra

card.name: Two-Gun Kid
card.property: [star] Interrupt: When Two-Gun Kid makes a basic attack, choose 2 enemies instead of 1 and resolve this attack against each of them.
"Alright fellas, say when."

card.name: Air Cover
card.property: Uses (2 fuel counters). Max 1 per player. Response: After a minion enters play, exhaust this card and remove 1 fuel counter from it → search your deck and discard pile for a [[Tactic]] upgrade that can be attached to that minion and add it to your hand.

card.name: Aggressive Conditioning
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. You get +3 hit points and your hero gets +1 ATK.

card.name: Suppressing Fire
card.property: Attach to a minion. Max 1 per minion. Hero Interrupt: When you attack and defeat attached minion, heal 2 damage from your hero.

card.name: Coup de Grâce
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Defeat a non-[[Elite]] minion with an upgrade attached. Ignore any "When Defeated" abilities on that minion.
"I'm putting an end to this – right now!" —Black Knight

card.name: Savage Strike
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, you get +6 ATK for this attack. This attack gains piercing.
KRACK!

card.name: Yellow Jacket
card.property: Play only if you have the [[Avenger]] trait. Response: After Yellow Jacket enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an upgrade and add it to your hand.
"I know what I have to do."

card.name: Energy
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Genius
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Strength
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Hulkling
card.property: Chosen Shape — Forced Response: After a [[Shapeshift]] upgrade enters play under your control, discard each other [[Shapeshift]] upgrade you control and ready Hulkling.

alternate.name: Teddy Altman
alternate.property: You cannot have more than 1 [[Shapeshift]] upgrade in play. Shape-Changer — Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a [[Shapeshift]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Wiccan
card.property: Response: After you play Wiccan from your hand, search your deck and discard pile for an identity-specific event and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)
"Hang on, Teddy! I got your back!"

card.name: Altman Residence
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Altman Residence → heal 2 damage from Teddy Altman and shuffle 1 Hulkling card from your discard pile into your deck.

card.name: Winged Shape
card.property: Hulkling gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, +1 DEF, and gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Winged Shape → remove 2 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Hulk Shape
card.property: Hulkling gets +2 ATK and +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Hulk Shape → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Armored Shape
card.property: Hulkling gets +1 ATK, +2 DEF, and gains retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Armored Shape → heal 2 damage from Hulkling.

card.name: Imitation Shape
card.property: Hulkling gets +2 THW. Forced Interrupt: When an enemy would attack you, it schemes instead. Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Imitation Shape → draw 1 card.

card.name: Alien Physiology
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Alien Physiology → generate a [wild] resource ([wild] [wild] resources instead if paying for a Hulkling card).
"When I first discovered my powers, I thought I was a mutant. But it turns out I'm an alien!"

card.name: Shapeshifter Strike
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Ready your [[Shapeshift]] upgrade.
"You don't touch my friends!" —Hulkling

card.name: Armored Defense
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, deal damage to it equal to your DEF. After this attack, give Hulkling a tough status card.

card.name: Impersonation
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, you may change to alter-ego form.
"I'm the Young Avengers' resident shape-changer." —Hulkling

card.name: Shapeshifter
card.property: Hero Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a [[Shapeshift]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)
"Didn't see that coming, did you?" —Hulkling

card.name: Patriot
card.property: Response: After you engage a minion, give Patriot a tough status card.
"I'm ready for anything."

card.name: Hidden Base
card.property: Uses (3 stronghold counters). Alter-Ego Response: After you change form, exhaust Hidden Base and remove 1 stronghold counter from it → give your identity a tough status card.

card.name: Excelsior
card.property: Restricted. (Max 2 restricted cards per player.) Response: After your hero defends against an enemy attack, spend a [energy] resource → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Defensive Conditioning
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. You get +3 hit points and your hero gets +1 DEF.

card.name: "I Can Do This All Day"
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, declare your hero as the defender without exhausting them.

card.name: Taunt
card.property: Hero Action: The villain attacks you. Other characters cannot defend against this attack. Draw 3 cards.

card.name: Cuts Both Ways
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, you gain retaliate 1 until the end of the phase.
"Two can play that game!" —Wiccan

card.name: Iron Lad
card.property: [star] Interrupt: When Iron Lad uses a basic power, exhaust another [[Avenger]] ally you control → add that ally's matching power to Iron Lad's power for this use.
"We became Young Avengers for a reason."

card.name: The Futurist
card.property: Action: Your Iron Man leader schemes. Do not give him a boost card for this activation.
"Steve's thinking is stuck in the past. This is the future, whether he likes it or not." —Iron Man

card.name: Target Lock
card.property: Action: Your Iron Man leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [mental] resource to pay for this event, choose an attachment on the enemy leader with the text "Hero Response" or "Hero Interrupt" and discard it.

card.name: High-Tech Suit
card.property: Attach to your Iron Man leader. Counts as a [[Tech]] attachment. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] resources → discard this card. Any player may trigger this ability.

card.name: Suit Up
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, give your Iron Man leader a tough status card.

card.name: Provoked Response
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When the enemy leader would attack you, it attacks your Captain Marvel leader instead. She cannot take more than 3 damage from this attack. Discard this card.

card.name: You Started This
card.property: Action: Your Captain Marvel leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [energy] resource to pay for this event, confuse the enemy leader.
"You should've known this was coming!" —Captain Marvel

card.name: Alpha Flight Recruit
card.property: Attach to an ally. Response: After any number of energy counters are placed on your Captain Marvel leader's Energy Channel attachment, heal 1 damage from attached ally.

card.name: Raw Power
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, place 2 energy counters on your Captain Marvel leader's Energy Channel attachment.

card.name: No, You Move!
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When the enemy leader would attack you, attach Cap's Shield to your Captain America leader and resolve this attack against him instead. Discard this card.

card.name: Fighting Dirty
card.property: Action: Your Captain America leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [physical] resource to pay for this event, stun the enemy leader.
"Things are different this time. Now I'm fighting dirty." —Captain America

card.name: Recruited by Cap
card.property: <b>Action<b/>: Choose a minion engaged with you and choose a player on the enemy team. That minion engages that player.
"We're glad to have you on our side." —Captain America

card.name: The People's Hero
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, give your Captain America leader a facedown boost card.

card.name: Double Agent
card.property: Action: Remove 2 threat from the main scheme. Place 2 threat on your leader's main scheme.
"When someone targets one of us, they answer to all of us." —Spider-Woman

card.name: Spider-Blast
card.property: Action: Your Spider-Woman leader attacks the enemy leader. If you spent a [mental] resource to pay for this event, confuse the enemy leader.
"From now on Spider-Woman fights back!" —Spider-Woman

card.name: Hard to Hit
card.property: Attach to your Spider-Woman leader and give her a tough status card. Forced Response: After attached Spider-Woman resolves an attack, place 2 skill counters on her Finesse attachment. Discard this card.

card.name: Secret Contact
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this resource, place 2 skill counters on your Spider-Woman leader's Finesse attachment.

card.name: In Too Deep
card.property: Give to the Greer Nelson player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Greer Nelson → remove In Too Deep from the game. • Each minion engage3d with you activates against you. If no minions activate this way, In Too Deep gains surge. Discard this card.

card.name: The Hood
card.property: Steady. Villainous. [star] Forced Response: After The Hood attacks, place 1 threat on the Criminal Underworld side scheme. (Tigra's nemesis minion.)

card.name: Criminal Underworld
card.property: Each [[Criminal]] minion cannot take damage.
The Hood has gathered the disparate elements of the criminal underworld together in one unified gang.

card.name: The Hood's Mantle
card.property:
Attach to The Hood. Otherwise, attach to the villain. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against attached enemy, spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Attach to The Hood. Otherwise, attach to the villain.

card.name: Madame Masque
card.property:
When Revealed: Place 2 threat on the Criminal Underwold side scheme. Otherwise, find Criminal Underworld and reveal it.
[star] Boost: Place 2 threat on the Criminal Underworld side scheme. Otherwise, this card gains [boost][boost].

card.name: Jigsaw
card.property: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Response: After Jigsaw attacks and damages a character, place 2 threat on the Criminal Underworld side scheme.
"Bad kitty!"

card.name: Complicated Lineage
card.property: Give to the Teddy Altman player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Teddy Altman → remove Complicated Lineage from the game. • Discard each [[Shapeshift]] upgrade you control. Discard this card.

card.name: Super Skrull
card.property: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Super Skrull attacks you, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [energy] – Super Skrull gets +2 ATK for this attack. [mental] – Discard 1 card from your hand. [physical] – Give Super Skrull a tough status card. [wild] – Discard an upgrade you control.

card.name: Skrull Business
card.property: Forced Response: After any number of cards are discarded from the top of a player's deck, place those cards facedown under this scheme.
Super Skrull was sent to abduct Hulkling after his true heritage was revealed.

card.name: Fantastic Powers
card.property: Attached minion gets +3 hit points and gains retaliate 1. When Revealed: Find Super Skrull. Put him into play engaged with you and attach Fantastic Powers to him. If you are in hero form, Super Skrull attacks you.

card.name: You're Coming With Me!
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different resource icon on the discarded cards. When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Take 1 damage for each different resource icon on the discarded coards ([energy], [mental], [physical], or [wild]).

card.name: Iron Man
card.property: [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). Setup: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for an Iron Man attachment and your team reveals it.

card.name: Iron Man
card.property: Steady. [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Iron Man cannot take damage this phase.

card.name: Iron Man
card.property: [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for an Iron Man attachment and your team reveals it.

card.name: Iron Man
card.property: Steady. [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Iron Man cannot take damage this phase.

card.name: Superhero Registration Act
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: Cut Off Support
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When a player reveals a treachery, place 1 threat here. (Limit once per phase per player.)
"Society will no longer tolerate superheroes who operate outside the law." —She-Hulk

card.name: Pro-Registration Tactics
card.property: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.

alternate.name: Negative Zone Prison
alternate.property: [star] Reduce the target threat value of this scheme by 1 for each facedown card under it. Forced Response: After an ally is defeated by an enemy attack, place that ally facedown under this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Powered Gauntlets
card.property:
Attach to Iron Man. [star] Iron Man's attacks gain ranged. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Rocket Boots
card.property:
Attach to Iron Man. Iron Man gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Mark V Helmet
card.property: Attach to Iron Man and give him a tough status card. Iron Man gains stalwart. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

card.name: Arc Reactor
card.property: Attach to Iron Man and give him a tough status card. Iron Man gains retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

card.name: Mark V Armor
card.property:
Attach to Iron Man. Forced Response: When Iron Man would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Repulsor Blast
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an upgrade or support you control. When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. For each printed [energy] and [wild] resource discarded this way, deal 1 damage to your hero.

card.name: Supersonic Punch
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Iron Man schemes. If he has a [[Tech]] attachment, you are confused. When Revealed (Hero): Iron Man attacks you. If he has a [[Tech]] attachment, this attack gains piercing.
"That's it. Now I'm mad!" —Iron Man

card.name: Stark Tower
card.property: When Defeated: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Iron Man attachment and your team reveals it.
Iron Man's vast wealth gives his Avengers a significant advantage over Captain America's outlaws.

card.name: Yellow Jacket
card.property:
Toughness. When Revealed: Give the enemy leader a tough status card.
[star] Boost: Give the enemy leader a tough status card.

card.name: Wasp
card.property:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.
[star] Boost: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: U.S. Agent
card.property:
Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to your identity.
[star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to your identity.

card.name: Mighty Avengers
card.property: When Revealed: Resolve the "When Revealed" ability of each minion in play. If no "When Revealed" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.
"Do us all a favor and stay down!" —Doc Samson

card.name: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Each [[Avenger]] minion gains the printed keywords of each other [[Avenger]] minion.
"We've got you outnumbered and outgunned." —Iron Man

card.name: Doc Samson
card.property:
Guard. When Revealed: You are confused. If you were already confused, place 2 threat on the main scheme.
[star] Boost: You are confused.

card.name: Hellcat
card.property:
Quickstrike. When Revealed: You are stunned. If you were already stunned, take 2 indirect damage.
[star] Boost: You are stunned.

card.name: Drafted
card.property: Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains the [[Avenger]] trait. When Revealed: In competitive mode, the enemy team attaches Drafted to a minion engaged with them and that minion engages you. Otherwise, discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Reveal that minion and attach Drafted to it.

card.name: Mighty Avengers
card.property: When Revealed: Resolve the "When Revealed" ability of each minion in play. If no "When Revealed" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.
"Do us all a favor and stay down!" —Doc Samson

card.name: The Fifty State Initiative
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Shuffle each [[Avenger]] minion in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
S.H.I.E.L.D. wants each state to have its own government-sponsored super team.

card.name: Maria Hill
card.property: Retaliate 2. When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Life Model Decoy and attaches it to Maria Hill.
"It's S.H.I.E.L.D.'s mission to protect the world!"

card.name: Life Model Decoy
card.property: The enemy team attaches this card to a minion or their leader. (Limit 1 per character.) Attached character gains stalwart. Forced Interrupt: When attached character would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent that damage and discard this card instead.

card.name: Executive Order
card.property:
When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each scheme. If Maria Hill is in play, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: If Maria Hill is in play, this card gains [boost][boost][boost].
"Stand down, Captain. You are NOT in command here!" —Maria Hill

card.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme deals 1 damager to each character they control and each minion engaged with them.
S.H.I.E.L.D. exerts influence across the world by deploying its helicarriers.

card.name: Venom
card.property: [star] Venom's attacks gain piercing. When Revealed: Venom attacks your leader. Otherwise, Venom activates against you.
"Just a bite! We won't kill them!"

card.name: Bullseye
card.property: When Revealed: The enemy team discards an attachment from your leader. Otherwise, discard an upgrade you control.
"This is too rich: I'm working for S.H.I.E.L.D. and Daredevil's the outlaw!"

card.name: Justice Like Lightning
card.property: When Revealed: Each minion activates against the player it is engaged with. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not give it a boost card for this activation.
"We're all guilty. This is justice!" —Penance

card.name: Excessive Force
card.property:
When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each minion in play. Otherwise, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: The enemy leader attacks your leader (after this activation). Do not give it a boost card for that attack.

card.name: Dangerous Recruits
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When a minion is defeated, give it to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
"They've all been fitted with explosive implants to ensure their compliance." —Maria Hill

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: Setup: The enemy team finds Energy Channel and attaches it to Captain Marvel. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain Marvel cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: Setup: The enemy team finds Energy Channel and attaches it to Captain Marvel. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain Marvel cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

card.name: Superhero Registration Act
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Recruits
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] minions and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card.

card.name: Pro-Registration Tactics
card.property: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.

alternate.name: Hunting Rebel Heroes
alternate.property: Each hero gains the [[Unregistered]] trait. Forced Response: After another card is revealed that gives 1 or more heroes the [[Unregistered]] trait, deal 2 damage to each of those heroes. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Energy Channel
card.property: Permanent. Forced Response: After a leader, hero, or ally attacks Captain Marvel, place 1 energy counter here. Then, if there are at least 4 energy counters here, remove all of them → Captain Marvel attacks that character. This attack gains overkill.

card.name: Captain Marvel's Helmet
card.property:
Attach to Captain Marvel. Captain Marvel gains stalwart. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Captain Marvel, spend 3 resources of the same type → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Cosmic Flight
card.property:
Attach to Captain Marvel. Forced Interrupt: When Captain Marvel would take more than 3 damage from an attack, reduce that amount to 3. Then, discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Photonic Blast
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an ally or support you control. When Revealed (Hero): Captain Marvel attacks you. Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

card.name: Crisis Interdiction
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Captain Marvel schemes. Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel. When Revealed (Hero): Place 2 threat on each scheme.

card.name: Energy Absorption
card.property:
When Revealed: Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel. Heal 1 damage from Captain Marvel for each energy counter on Energy Channel.
[star] Boost: Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

card.name: Alpha Flight Station
card.property: When Defeated: Place 3 energy counters on Energy Channel.
"Keep your sensors locked on North America. I want to know the location of Cap's headquarters." —Captain Marvel

card.name: Cape-Killer
card.property: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Cape-Killer attacks an identity with the [[Unregistered]] trait, it gets +2 ATK for this attack.
S.H.I.E.L.D. formed an elite unit to confront and capture renegade superheroes.

card.name: Unregistered Super
card.property: Your identity gains the [[Unregistered]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Discard an identity-specific card from your hand → discard this card.

card.name: Bring Them In
card.property: When Revealed: Exhaust each [[Unregistered]] identity. Otherwise, the enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Unregistered Super and deals it to you as a facedown encounter card.

card.name: Arrest Order
card.property: When Defeated: The defeating player deals the topmost [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] minion in the encounter discard pile to themself as a facedown encounter card.
"Look what happens when you break the law!" —S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer

card.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Soldier
card.property:
When Revealed: Put the topmost [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] minion in the encounter discard pile into play engaged with you.
[star] Boost: Put this minion into play engaged with you.

card.name: Rapid Response
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, place threat on the main scheme equal to that minion's SCH. • Hero form, deal damage to your hero equal to that minion's ATK.

card.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Patrol
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Each minion gains guard.
"Stay alert. Cap's Avengers were last seen in this area." —S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer

card.name: Colleen Wing
card.property: When Revealed: Choose an ally you control (the enemy team chooses instead if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Discard that ally.
"I don't like hunting down our friends, but it's better us than the Thunderbolts."

card.name: Shang-Chi
card.property: When Revealed: Choose an upgrade you control (the enemy team chooses instead if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Discard that upgrade.
"There is no shame in a righteous cause."

card.name: Unregistered Super
card.property: Your identity gains the [[Unregistered]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Discard an identity-specific card from your hand → discard this card.

card.name: Bounty Hunting
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 1 card from your hand (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each resource icon on that card.
"I'm glad you guys went rogue; it's gonna be a big payday for me." —Paladin

card.name: Heroes for Hire
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Unregistered Super and deals it to the defeating player as a facedown encounter card.

card.name: Paladin
card.property: Quickstrike. Toughness. When Revealed: Discard 1 card from your hand (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait).
"I'm not in this for your political agenda. I'm in it for the money."

card.name: Paladin's Pistol
card.property: Attack to Paladin. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached character attacks, this attack gains ranged and overkill. Discard this card after this attack.

card.name: Bounty Hunting
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 1 card from your hand (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each resource icon on that card.
"I'm glad you guys went rogue; it's gonna be a big payday for me." —Paladin

card.name: Government Contractor
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Each identity gains the [[Unregistered]] trait.
When Captain America took his resistance underground, Iron Man contracted Paladin and the Heroes for Hire to track him down.

card.name: Superhero Registration Act
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: Homeland Security
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. Each minion gains guard.
With armed S.H.I.E.L.D. units patrolling the streets, crime rates have fallen to record lows.

card.name: Superhero Registration Act
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: Public Outrage
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck.
"I can't believe Captain America has turned against his country!" —J. Jonah Jameson

card.name: Pro-Registration Tactics
card.property: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.

alternate.name: The Initiative
alternate.property: When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1[per_hero] side schemes and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
"Wait until they see our plans to protect the midwest." —Yellowjacket

card.name: Pro-Registration Tactics
card.property: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.

alternate.name: No Going Back
alternate.property: Allies enter play exhausted. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
"There's no more amnesty for Cap and his renegades. It's gone too far!" —She-Hulk

card.name: Righteous Cause
card.property: When Revealed: The enemy leader schemes. If there is more than 1 player on your team, give the enemy leader an additional boost card for this activation.
"I was a double agent for years. There's not much I won't do for a just cause." —Spider-Woman

card.name: Whatever It Takes
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The enemy leader attacks your leader. When Revealed (Hero): The enemy leader attacks you.
"I'm on target. Commence attack." —Captain Marvel

card.name: Targeted Strike
card.property:
When Revealed: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card and deals it to you as a facedown encounter card.
[star] Boost: The card gains [boost] for each player on your team.

card.name: Choosing Sides
card.property: Permanent. The enemy leader cannot take more than 2 damage from each attack. Forced Response: After the last threat is removed from here, the enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] encounter cards and deals one to each player as a facedown encounter card. Flip this card.

alternate.name: Now It's Personal
alternate.property: Give to the first player. Action: Remove this card from the game → each player on your team chooses 2 of your leader's set-aside player cards and adds them to their hand.

card.name: Captain America
card.property: Setup: The enemy team finds Cap's Shield and attaches it to Captain America. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.
"Just because it's the law doesn't mean it's right."

card.name: Captain America
card.property: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain America cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.

card.name: Captain America
card.property: Setup: The enemy team finds Cap's Shield and attaches it to Captain America. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.
"Just because it's the law doesn't mean it's right."

card.name: Captain America
card.property: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain America cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.

card.name: Superhero Resistance
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: Gathering Support
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] minions and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card.

card.name: Resistance Tactics
card.property: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.

alternate.name: Secret Avengers
alternate.property: The enemy leader gets +1 ATK while attacking (+2 ATK instead if the attack is undefended). If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Captain America's Avengers continue to fight crime from their secret hideout.

card.name: Cap's Shield
card.property: Permanent. Attach to Captain America. Attached character gains retaliate 1 and attacks against them lose piercing. Forced Response: After a hero or the Captain America leader uses their ATK to attack and damage attached character, attach Cap's Shield to the attacker.

card.name: Cap's Helmet
card.property:
Attach to Captain America. Captain America gains stalwart. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Captain America, spend 3 resources of the same type → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Super-Soldier Serum
card.property:
Attach to Captain America. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Captain America attacks, this attack gains overkill. At the end of this attack, discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Shield Block
card.property: When Revealed: If Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card and a facedown boost card. Otherwise, attach Cap's Shield to him and give him a facedown boost card.
"Take your best shot!" —Captain America

card.name: Shield Toss
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Captain America schemes. When Revealed (Hero): If Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, deal 2 damage to each character you control. Otherwise, attach Cap's Shield to Captain America.

card.name: Heroic Strike
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an ally or upgrade you control. When Revealed (Hero): Captain America attacks you. If this attack damages a character, stun that character.

card.name: Fearless Determination
card.property: When Defeated: Attach Cap's Shield to Captain America. He activates against the player who defeated this scheme.
Captain America's stand against the Superhero Registration Act gives other heroes a figure to rally behind.

card.name: Falcon
card.property:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: You are confused. If you were already confused, this card gains [boost][boost].

card.name: Hercules
card.property:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: You are stunned. If you were already stunned, this card gains [boost][boost].

card.name: Goliath
card.property:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: Give the enemy leader a tough status card. If they were already tough, this card gains [boost][boost].

card.name: Freedom Fighters
card.property:
When Revealed: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion in play. If no "Boost" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion engaged with you.

card.name: New Avengers
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Shuffle each minion in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
"Tony's team is in for a big surprise!" —Captain America

card.name: Black Panther
card.property:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: Exhaust each upgrade you control.

card.name: Spectrum
card.property:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control.

card.name: Freedom Fighters
card.property:
When Revealed: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion in play. If no "Boost" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion engaged with you.

card.name: Switching Sides
card.property: When Revealed: Discard an ally you control. In competitive mode, any player on the enmy team may spend resources equal to that ally's cost to put it into play under their control. If no ally left play this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Secret Avengers
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card. Give that card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.

card.name: Namor
card.property: Stalwart. Toughness. Villainous. When Revealed: Namor activates against you.
"Once more, the surface-dwellers' war has injured my Atlanteans and the Sub-Mariner must avenge them."

card.name: Neptune's Trident
card.property: Attach to Namor. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Attached character's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.

card.name: Horn of Proteus
card.property: Attach to Namor. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached character schemes, give it a tough status card. Hero Action: Spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

card.name: Imperius Rex!
card.property:
When Revealed: If Namor is in play, he activates against you. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you.
[star] Boost: Give the activating enemy an additional boost card.

card.name: Ruler of Atlantis
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Each [[Atlantis]] minion cannot take damage.
"There is nothing Namor will not dare or do to defend his people." —Namor

card.name: Atlantean Guard
card.property: Guard. When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
"For Namor and the glory of Atlantis!"

card.name: Atlanteans
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different card type discarded this way. • Hero form, take 1 indirect damage for each different card type discarded this way.

card.name: Atlantis Attacks
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Revealed: Discard the top 1[per_hero] cards of your deck. Place 1 acceleration token here for each different card type discarded this way.
The Atlanteans as a people share a deep mistrust of surface-dwellers and enmity for the pollution of their waters.

card.name: Spider-Woman
card.property: Setup: The enemy team finds Finesse and attaches it to Spider-Woman. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

card.name: Spider-Woman
card.property: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Spider-Woman cannot take damage this phase. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

card.name: Spider-Woman
card.property: Setup: The enemy team finds Finesse and attaches it to Spider-Woman. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

card.name: Spider-Woman
card.property: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Spider-Woman cannot take damage this phase. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

card.name: Superhero Resistance
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: Open Rebellion
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When a player reveals a treachery, place 1 threat here. (Limit once per phase per player.)
"Why don't you chase after the REAL bad guys?" —Hulkling

card.name: Resistance Tactics
card.property: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.

alternate.name: Neighborhood Protectors
alternate.property: When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1[per_hero] side schemes and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
"Does anyone else see the irony in outlaw heroes fighting crime?" —Chief of Police

card.name: Finesse
card.property: Permanent. Max 3 skill counters here. Forced Interrupt: When a treachery is revealed, place 1 skill counter here.

card.name: Contaminant Immunity
card.property:
Attach to Spider-Woman. Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman would be stunned or confused, discard this card instead. Give her a tough status card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Pheromones
card.property:
When Revealed: You are stunned and confused. Place 1 skill counter on Finesse.
[star] Boost: You are stunned. Otherwise, you are confused.

card.name: Venom Blast
card.property:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Spider-Woman attacks you. If this attack removed the following skill counters from Finesse: • At least 1, this attack gains ranged. • At least 2, this attack gains piercing. • At least 3, this attack gains overkill. You are stunned and confused. Place 1 skill counter on Finesse.
[star] Boost: You are stunned. Otherwise, you are confused.

card.name: Inconspicuous
card.property:
When Revealed: Chooose: • Discard the highest-cost card you control • Spider-Woman schemes.
[star] Boost: This card gains [boost] for each status card on your identity.

card.name: Self-propelled Glide
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman would take damage from an attack, reduce the amount of damage she takes by 1 for each skill counter on Finesse.
"I've made a career out of staying one step ahead of S.H.I.E.L.D." —Spider-Woman

card.name: Spider-Man
card.property: When Revealed: Spider-Man attacks each character with Tangled Up attached. If no attack was made this way, the enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Tangled Up and gives it to you as a facedown encounter card.

card.name: Tangled Up
card.property:
Attach to your leader. Otherwise, attach to your hero. Forced Interrupt: When attached character would scheme, thwart, or attack, discard this card instead.
[star] Boost: If the Spider-Man minion is in play, reveal this card.

card.name: Spectacular!
card.property: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on the main scheme. In competitive mode, remove 2 threat from your leader's main scheme.
"Friendly neighborhood Spider-Man swinging through!" —Spider-Man

card.name: Neighborhood Hero
card.property: When Revealed: In competitive mode, move 2 threat from your leader's main scheme to this scheme. Otherwise, place 2[per_hero] threat here.
"This isn't about politics; it's about saving lives!" —Spider-Man

card.name: Luke Cage
card.property:
When Revealed: Stun your leader. Otherwise, you are stunned.
[star] Boost: Stun your leader. Otherwise, you are stunned.
"You S.H.I.E.L.D. boys better get out of my face."

card.name: Jessica Jones
card.property:
When Revealed: Confuse your leader. Otherwise, you are confused.
[star] Boost: Confuse your leader. Otherwise, you are confused.
"I thought I was done with all this superhero crap."

card.name: Protect the Innocent
card.property: When Revealed: Give the enemy leader and each minion a tough status card. If the enemy leader was already tough, this card gains surge.
"Since when is it illegal to save lives?" —Daredevil

card.name: Street Defenders
card.property: When Revealed: Each minion activates against the player it is engaged with. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not give it a boost card for this activation.

card.name: The Defenders
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Each minion gains guard.
The Defenders were formed to protect people often overlooked by the Avengers.

card.name: Daredevil
card.property:
When Revealed: The enemy team exhausts a character you control.
[star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control.
"My respect for the law doesn't blind my sense of right and wrong."

card.name: Iron Fist
card.property:
When Revealed: Iron Fist attacks your leader. Otherwise, Iron Fist activates against you.
[star] Boost: The enemy leader attacks your leader (after this activation). Do not give it a boost card for this attack.

card.name: Resistance Fighter
card.property:
Attach to a minion of the enemy team's choice. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion gets +4 hit points and gains stalwart.
[star] Boost: Attach this card to a minion engaged with you.

card.name: Street Defenders
card.property: When Revealed: Each minion activates against the player it is engaged with. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not give it a boost card for this activation.

card.name: Defend Hell's Kitchen
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [[Defender]] minion is in play.
"Tell S.H.I.E.L.D. to pull back. This city is under our protection." —Daredevil

card.name: Cloak
card.property:
When Revealed: Place 2 threat on a scheme. In competitive mode, remove 2 threat from your leader's main scheme.
[star] Boost: If Dagger is in play, reveal Cloak. Otherwise, place 1 threat on a scheme.

card.name: Dagger
card.property:
When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from the enemy leader. Deal 2 damage to a character you control.
[star] Boost: If Cloak is in play, reveal Dagger. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to a character you control.

card.name: Darkforce
card.property: Attach to the enemy leader and give them a tough status card. [star] Forced Response: After attached leader schemes and places threat on the main scheme, remove an equal amount of threat from your leader's main scheme. Discard this card.

card.name: Lightforce
card.property: When Revealed: Heal 3 damage from the enemy leader. Take 3 indirect damage.
"Maybe my daggers will help them see the light!" —Dagger

card.name: Cloak and Dagger
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Heal 3 damage from the enemy leader and give them a tough status card.
Cloak and Dagger were among the first to join Captain America's superhero resistance.

card.name: Superhero Resistance
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: Rallying Call
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. Each minion gains guard.
Captain America's public denouncement of the Superhero Registration Act drew many allies to his side.

card.name: Superhero Resistance
card.property: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

alternate.name: Going Underground
alternate.property: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. The enemy leader gains steady.
"I forgot how exhausting it is to be undercover!" —Spider-Woman

card.name: Resistance Tactics
card.property: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.

alternate.name: Guerilla Warfare
alternate.property: Forced Response: After a status card is placed on the enemy leader, place 1 threat here. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
The goal of the resistance is to wear S.H.I.E.L.D. down until the Superhero Registration law is overturned.

card.name: Resistance Tactics
card.property: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.

alternate.name: Superhero Jailbreak
alternate.property: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, each player discards the top card of the encounter deck. Each player who discards a minion this way puts it into play engaged with them. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Righteous Cause
card.property: When Revealed: The enemy leader schemes. If there is more than 1 player on your team, give the enemy leader an additional boost card for this activation.
"I was a double agent for years. There's not much I won't do for a just cause." —Spider-Woman

card.name: Whatever It Takes
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The enemy leader attacks your leader. When Revealed (Hero): The enemy leader attacks you.
"I'm on target. Commence attack." —Captain Marvel

card.name: Targeted Strike
card.property:
When Revealed: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card and deals it to you as a facedown encounter card.
[star] Boost: The card gains [boost] for each player on your team.

card.name: Choosing Sides
card.property: Permanent. The enemy leader cannot take more than 2 damage from each attack. Forced Response: After the last threat is removed from here, the enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] encounter cards and deals one to each player as a facedown encounter card. Flip this card.

alternate.name: Now It's Personal
alternate.property: Give to the first player. Action: Remove this card from the game → each player on your team chooses 2 of your leader's set-aside player cards and adds them to their hand.
